BALANCE

BALANCE is an interactve web project. We created two interactive animations by Javascript. Users could change the variable within a range and create their own version of a "balanced shape". They can also submit the shape they created to our database and get their own shape 3D printed out.

BALANCE is a collective internet art piece that involves big data, digital fabrication, parametric design and psychology.

VISIT BALANCE LIVE SITE

try the interactive animations on live balance site.
